examplePhrases: Alexa ask hospital parking if there are any parking spaces available
en-GB.name: Parkly
en-GB.description:
In this skill you are able top check for any available parking spaces in your nearest hospital.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Hospital Parking" or "Alexa, open Hospital Parking" to start".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
